00092 //! Fonction principale de l'interprete:<br>resoudre un probleme<br>Le probleme est pilote via l'interface ICoCo<br>On lui fournit a chaque pas de temps les champs<br>d'entree "pression_sortie" et "vitesse_entree"<br>qui sont respectivement un ch_front_input et un ch_front_input_uniforme<br>Montre l'utilisation de l'avance en temps et des input fields
00093 
00094 // Utilisation dans le JDD : Pilote_ICoCo_1 pb
00095 // Utilise dans le cas test U_in_var_impl_ICoCo
00096 void main_pilote_icoco_1(Probleme_U& pb_to_solve)
00097 {
00098 
00099   ProblemTrio pb;
00100 
00101   Nom pb_name=pb_to_solve.le_nom();
00102   pb.initialize_pb(pb_to_solve);
00103 
00104   bool stop=false; //!< Does the Problem want to stop ?
00105   bool ok=true; //!< Is the time interval successfully solved ?
00106 
00107 // Compute the first time step length
00108   double dt=pb.computeTimeStep(stop);
00109 
00110 // Loop on the time steps
00111   while(!stop)
00112     {
00113 
00114       ok=false; //!< Is the time interval successfully solved ?
00115 
00116 // Loop on the time interval tries
00117       while (!ok && !stop)
00118         {
00119 
00120 // Prepare the next time step
00121           ok=pb.initTimeStep(dt);
00122           if (!ok)
00123             break;
00124 
00125 // Example of field exchange
00126           {
00127             vector<string> sv=pb.getInputFieldsNames();
00128             cout << "Input Fields for " << pb_name << " :" << endl;
00129             for (unsigned i=0; i<sv.size(); i++)
00130               std::cout << i << ". " << sv[i] << std::endl;
00131 
00132             TrioField afield;
00133             int nb_elems,nb_comp;
00134 
00135 // Get the right geometry & nbcomp for "pression_sortie"
00136             pb.getInputFieldTemplate("pression_sortie",afield);
00137 // Allocate memory for the values (size=nb_elems*nb_comp)
00138             afield.set_standalone();
00139 // Fill the values
00140             nb_elems=afield._nb_elems;
00141             nb_comp=afield._nb_field_components;
00142             assert(nb_comp==1);
00143             for (int i=0; i<nb_elems; i++)
00144               afield._field[i]=0;
00145 // Give the field to the problem
00146             pb.setInputField("pression_sortie",afield);
00147 
00148 // Get the right geometry & nbcomp for "vitesse_entree"
00149             pb.getInputFieldTemplate("vitesse_entree",afield);
00150 // Allocate memory for the values (size=nb_elems*nb_comp)
00151             afield.set_standalone();
00152 // Fill the values
00153             nb_elems=afield._nb_elems;
00154             nb_comp=afield._nb_field_components;
00155             assert(nb_elems==1); //!< ch_front_input_uniforme in the data file
00156             double t=pb.presentTime();
00157             t+=dt;
00158             double vx=(t>100)?100:t;
00159             for (int i=0; i<nb_elems; i++)
00160               for (int j=0; j<afield._nb_field_components; j++)
00161                 afield._field[i*nb_comp+j]=(j==0)?vx:0;
00162 // Give the field to the problem
00163             pb.setInputField("vitesse_entree",afield);
00164           }
00165 
00166 // Solve the next time step
00167           ok=pb.solveTimeStep();
00168 
00169           if (!ok)   //!< The resolution failed, try with a new time interval.
00170             {
00171               pb.abortTimeStep();
00172               dt=pb.computeTimeStep(stop);
00173             }
00174 
00175           else //!< The resolution was successful, validate and go to the next time step.
00176 //
00177             pb.validateTimeStep();
00178         }
00179 
00180       if (!ok) //!< Impossible to solve the next time step, the Problem
00181         break; //!< has given up
00182 
00183 // Compute the next time step length
00184       dt=pb.computeTimeStep(stop);
00185 
00186 // Stop the resolution if the Problem is stationnary
00187       if (pb.isStationary())
00188         stop=true;
00189     }
00190 
00191   pb.terminate();
00192 
00193 }

00200 //! Fonction principale de l'interprete:<br>resoudre un probleme<br>Le probleme est pilote via l'interface ICoCo.<br>On lui fournit a chaque pas de temps le champ<br>d'entree "puissance" qui est un Champ_input_P0<br>Montre l'utilisation de l'avance en temps et des input fields
00201 
00202 // Utilisation dans le JDD : Pilote_ICoCo_2 pb
00203 // Utilise dans le cas test ChDonXYZ_ICoCo
00204 void main_pilote_icoco_2(Probleme_U& pb_to_solve)
00205 {
00206 
00207   ProblemTrio pb;
00208 
00209   Nom pb_name=pb_to_solve.le_nom();
00210   pb.initialize_pb(pb_to_solve);
00211 
00212   bool stop=false; //!< Does the Problem want to stop ?
00213   bool ok=true; //!< Is the time interval successfully solved ?
00214 
00215 // Compute the first time step length
00216   double dt=pb.computeTimeStep(stop);
00217 
00218 // Loop on the time steps
00219   while(!stop)
00220     {
00221 
00222       ok=false; //!< Is the time interval successfully solved ?
00223 
00224 // Loop on the time interval tries
00225       while (!ok && !stop)
00226         {
00227 
00228 // Prepare the next time step
00229           ok=pb.initTimeStep(dt);
00230           if (!ok)
00231             break;
00232 
00233 // Example of field exchange
00234           {
00235             vector<string> sv=pb.getInputFieldsNames();
00236             cout << "Input Fields for " << pb_name << " :" << endl;
00237             for (unsigned i=0; i<sv.size(); i++)
00238               std::cout << i << ". " << sv[i] << std::endl;
00239 
00240             TrioField afield;
00241             int nb_elems;
00242 
00243 // Get the right geometry & nbcomp for "puissance"
00244             pb.getInputFieldTemplate("puissance",afield);
00245 // Allocate memory for the values (size=nb_elems*nb_comp)
00246             afield.set_standalone();
00247 // Fill the values
00248             nb_elems=afield._nb_elems;
00249 // nb_comp=afield._nb_field_components;
00250             assert(afield._nb_field_components==1);
00251             assert(afield._space_dim==2);
00252             for (int i=0; i<nb_elems; i++)
00253               {
00254 // Find gravity center of the element.
00255                 double x=0,y=0;
00256                 for (int j=0; j<afield._nodes_per_elem; j++)
00257                   {
00258                     int som=afield._connectivity[afield._nodes_per_elem*i+j];
00259                     x+=afield._coords[som*2];
00260                     y+=afield._coords[som*2+1];
00261                   }
00262                 x/=afield._nodes_per_elem;
00263                 y/=afield._nodes_per_elem;
00264                 afield._field[i]=(((x-0.5)*(x-0.5)+(y-0.5)*(y-0.5))<0.3*0.3)*10;
00265               }
00266 // Give the field to the problem
00267             pb.setInputField("puissance",afield);
00268           }
00269 
00270 // Solve the next time step
00271           ok=pb.solveTimeStep();
00272 
00273           if (!ok)   //!< The resolution failed, try with a new time interval.
00274             {
00275               pb.abortTimeStep();
00276               dt=pb.computeTimeStep(stop);
00277             }
00278 
00279           else //!< The resolution was successful, validate and go to the next time step.
00280 //
00281             pb.validateTimeStep();
00282         }
00283 
00284       if (!ok) //!< Impossible to solve the next time step, the Problem
00285         break; //!< has given up
00286 
00287 // Compute the next time step length
00288       dt=pb.computeTimeStep(stop);
00289 
00290 // Stop the resolution if the Problem is stationnary
00291       if (pb.isStationary())
00292         stop=true;
00293     }
00294 
00295   pb.terminate();
00296 }

00300 // Precondition:
00301 // Parametre: Entree& is
00302 // Signification: un flot d'entree
00303 // Valeurs par defaut:
00304 // Contraintes:
00305 // Acces: entree/sortie
00306 // Exception:
00307 // Effets de bord:
00308 // Postcondition:

00313 //! Fonction principale de l'interprete:<br>resoudre un probleme<br>Le probleme est pilote via l'interface ICoCo<br>Le troisieme pas de temps est effectue deux fois
00314 /** \return Entree\&<br>
00315 Signification: le flot d'entree modifie<br>
00316 Contraintes: */
00317 void main_abort( Probleme_U& pb_to_solve)
00318 {
00319 // char* pb_name=nom1.getChar();
00320   ProblemTrio pb;
00321 // pb.setDataFile(pb_name);
00322 
00323   pb.initialize_pb(pb_to_solve);
00324 
00325   bool stop=false; //!< Does the Problem want to stop ?
00326   bool ok=true; //!< Is the time interval successfully solved ?
00327   int n=0;
00328 // loop on time step
00329   while (!stop)                       //!< Loop on timesteps
00330     {
00331 
00332       ok=false;
00333 
00334       while (!ok && !stop)                  //!< Loop on timestep tries
00335         {
00336 
00337 // compute time step length
00338           double dt=pb.computeTimeStep(stop);
00339 
00340           if (stop)
00341             break;
00342 
00343 // prepare the new time step
00344           pb.initTimeStep(dt);
00345 
00346 // ---------------------
00347 // Solve next time step
00348 // ---------------------
00349 
00350           {
00351             TrioField afield;
00352             int nb_elems;
00353             pb.getInputFieldTemplate("temperature_bord",afield);
00354             afield.set_standalone();
00355             nb_elems=afield._nb_elems;
00356             for (int i=0; i<nb_elems; i++)
00357               afield._field[i]=600;
00358             pb.setInputField("temperature_bord",afield);
00359           }
00360 
00361 
00362           bool ok2=pb.solveTimeStep();
00363 
00364           n++;
00365           if (!ok2 || n==3)   //!< The resolution failed, try with a new time interval
00366             {
00367               Cerr<<" call of abortTimeStep" <<finl;
00368               pb.abortTimeStep();
00369             }
00370           else   //!< validate and go to the next time step
00371             {
00372               pb.validateTimeStep();
00373             }
00374         }                                     //!< End loop on timestep size
00375     }                                   //!< End loop on timesteps
00376 
00377   pb.terminate();
00378 }
00379 Entree& Pilote_ICoCo::interpreter(Entree& is)
00380 {
00381   Param param(que_suis_je());
00382   Nom nom1;
00383   param.ajouter("pb_name",&nom1,Param::REQUIRED);
00384   int methode=-1;
00385   param.ajouter("main",&methode,Param::REQUIRED);
00386   param.dictionnaire("abort_time_step",0);
00387   param.dictionnaire("Pilote_ICoCo_1",1);
00388   param.dictionnaire("Pilote_ICoCo_2",2);
00389   param.lire_avec_accolades_depuis(is);
00390   Probleme_U& pb_to_solve=ref_cast(Probleme_U,objet(nom1));
00391   switch (methode)
00392     {
00393     case 0:
00394       main_abort(pb_to_solve);
00395       break;
00396     case 1:
00397       main_pilote_icoco_1(pb_to_solve);
00398       break;
00399     case 2:
00400       main_pilote_icoco_2(pb_to_solve);
00401       break;
00402     default:
00403       {
00404         Cerr<<que_suis_je()<<" main numero "<<methode<<" not implemnted"<<finl;
00405         exit();
00406       }
00407     }
00408   return is;
00409 }
